participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys being social and helping others.
participant_1.background: I'm a professional wrestler. I volunteer in a homeless shelter. In my spare time, I do volunteer work. I like to work out a few times a week. I enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat introverted, finds joy in simple pleasures like food.
participant_2.background: I've zero family that I'm close to. My favorite food is papaya. I am a bee farmer. My name is George.

content.text: My name is george, what is your name?
i've zero family that i'm close to and I wish to be a relative to you
i'm a drummer in a popular band and my favorite food is papaya. What is your favorite food?
